experience.title: TechWorks
description: Implemented cloud-based infrastructure solutions with AWS for clients in healthcare, optimizing their systems and reducing costs by 25%.
Developed serverless applications using AWS Lambda and DynamoDB, improving system scalability and reducing maintenance costs.
Collaborated with DevOps teams to deploy applications using Docker, Jenkins, and Kubernetes, streamlining CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Innovative Solutions Inc.
description: Designed and optimized RESTful APIs using Node.js and MySQL, enabling the efficient processing of over 1,000,000 requests per day.
Built microservices architecture to support scalable solutions and improved system reliability by 30%.
Worked closely with frontend teams to integrate APIs into React-based applications.

projects.title: E-Commerce Analytics Dashboard
description: Developed a dashboard using Vue.js and Express.js for tracking e-commerce sales metrics, helping small businesses optimize their operations.
Implemented real-time data visualizations with Chart.js, allowing business owners to make data-driven decisions quickly.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker Application
description: Created a fitness tracker application that syncs data from wearable devices using REST APIs, allowing users to monitor their health progress.
Used Vue.js for the frontend and integrated a Node.js backend with MongoDB for data storage and analysis.

projects.title: Smart Home Control System
description: Built a smart home control system that integrates with IoT devices using MQTT protocol.
The system allows users to control lights, temperature, and appliances remotely via a mobile app built with React Native.
